import React, { Component } from 'react' import { movies } from './Getmovies' export default class Favourities extends Component { render() { const movie=movies.results let genreids = {28:'Action',12:'Adventure',16:'Animation',35:'Comedy',80:'Crime',99:'Documentary',18:'Drama',10751:'Family',14:'Fantasy',36:'History', 27:'Horror',10402:'Music',9648:'Mystery',10749:'Romance',878:'Sci-Fi',10770:'TV',53:'Thriller',10752:'War',37:'Western'}; let temp=[]; temp.push("All Generes") movie.map((movieObj)=>{ if(!temp.includes(genreids[movieObj.genre_ids[0]])) { temp.push(genreids[movieObj.genre_ids[0]]) } }) return (
<>
    { temp.map((tempObj)=>(
  • {tempObj}
    • )) }
{ movie.map((moviesObj)=>( ))}
title Genere Popularity Rating
{}{" "}{ moviesObj.title} {genreids[moviesObj.genre_ids[0]]} {moviesObj.popularity} {moviesObj.vote_average}

  • 2

) } }
